questions: What is the Hemingway content assistant?
What can the Hemingway AI tool do?
How does the Hemingway assistant work?
What features does Hemingway AI offer?
What's the purpose of the Hemingway sidebar?
answer: The Hemingway content assistant is a generative AI tool that enhances your email and landing page content. It provides smart suggestions, rewrites, summaries, translations, and brainstorming features—all accessible directly within the content editing interface. For a full walkthrough, watch the video tutorial here: https://www.tailorednews.com/u/lp/ClientComms/t/c-1x-QIOpsHBtSKoiyE-QP6cbRsq3-QkW8Fk/m/e/Video-Tutorial-Page.htm

questions: Where can I find the Hemingway AI assistant?
Is Hemingway available in the microsite UI?
Can I use Hemingway in landing pages?
Where is the Hemingway tool located in the editor?
How do I access Hemingway content assistant?
answer: You can access the Hemingway AI assistant directly from within the content editor—whether you're editing emails, landing pages, or microsites. Just hover over a content block and click the blue star icon to bring up the AI tools.

questions: How does the Proofread feature work?
What does Proofread do in Hemingway?
Can Hemingway check my grammar and spelling?
What does the Proofread tool show?
Does Hemingway provide word count and read time?
answer: The Proofread feature analyzes your content and provides a word count, estimated reading time, and grammar/spelling suggestions. It compares your original content with improved versions and allows you to copy or apply edits as needed.

questions: What does the Condense feature do?
Can Hemingway shorten my text?
How can I make my text more concise?
Is there a way to rewrite my content with fewer words?
Can I change the length of my writing with Hemingway?
answer: The Condense feature rewrites your content to fit a specific length. You can shorten or expand text as needed—for example, converting a 50-word block into a 20-word summary while preserving meaning.

questions: How do I generate subject lines using Hemingway?
Can Hemingway suggest email subject lines?
How does the Headline feature work?
Does Hemingway help with email subject lines?
Where can I generate subject line ideas?
answer: The Headline tool reads your content and returns a list of suggested subject lines. These include different tones like urgency, curiosity, or brevity. You can generate more options, edit the source content, or pick short formats (like 5 words or less).

questions: What is the Rewrite feature for?
Can Hemingway change the tone of my text?
How do I rewrite content using Hemingway?
Can I rewrite with a persuasive or professional tone?
What tones can I select in the Rewrite tool?
answer: The Rewrite feature lets you regenerate your content in different tones. Options include professional, descriptive, narrative, expository, and persuasive. Simply select a tone and Hemingway will revise your text accordingly.

questions: What is the News Summary feature?
How does Hemingway summarize long articles?
Can Hemingway extract key points from a text?
What does the News Summary tool output?
Does Hemingway help simplify detailed content?
answer: News Summary extracts the key messages from long articles. It produces a brief summary, lists key points, explains why the article matters, and may suggest follow-up ideas. It’s ideal for simplifying verbose content.

questions: How does the Translate feature work?
Can Hemingway translate my content?
Does Hemingway keep formatting during translation?
Will buttons or HTML be affected in translation?
Can I create multilingual versions with Hemingway?
answer: The Translate tool converts your content from one language to another (e.g. English to Spanish) while preserving the full HTML structure, links, and formatting. It's designed for fast, high-quality multilingual newsletter creation.

questions: What is the Brainstorm feature?
Can I ask Hemingway custom questions?
How do I use freeform prompts in Hemingway?
What’s the purpose of the Brainstorm card?
Can I interact with the AI using my own inputs?
answer: The Brainstorm feature gives you an open-ended interface to interact with the AI using your own custom prompts. You can ask it to generate summaries, ideas, tips, or content enhancements based on your specific request.

questions: What's the difference between the block-level and full-page Hemingway icons?
Can I run AI tools on individual blocks?
How do I use Hemingway with one block of content?
What’s the purpose of the smaller AI icon in green sections?
answer: The smaller Hemingway icon within a green content block runs AI actions only on that specific block. The full-page icon processes the entire page. This lets you fine-tune edits to individual sections without affecting the full document.
